mapper.insert: insert into tp_withdrawals (user_id, money, create_time, check_time, pay_time, refuse_time, bank_name, bank_card, realname, remark, taxfee, status, pay_code, error_code, is_paid, query_time, order_sn, serial_number, send_type) values (#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{create_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{check_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pay_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{refuse_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank_card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{pay_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{error_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_paid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{query_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serial_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{send_type,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update tp_withdrawals set user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, check_time = #{check_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_time = #{pay_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, refuse_time = #{refuse_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, bank_name = #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card = #{bank_card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taxfee = #{taxfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, pay_code = #{pay_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_code = #{error_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_paid = #{is_paid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, query_time = #{query_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_sn = #{order_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serial_number = #{serial_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, send_type = #{send_type,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, money, create_time, check_time, pay_time, refuse_time, bank_name, bank_card, realname, remark, taxfee, status, pay_code, error_code, is_paid, query_time, order_sn, serial_number, send_type from tp_withdrawals where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, user_id, money, create_time, check_time, pay_time, refuse_time, bank_name, bank_card, realname, remark, taxfee, status, pay_code, error_code, is_paid, query_time, order_sn, serial_number, send_type from tp_withdrawals
select count(id) from tp_withdrawals where user_id = #{user_id}
select * from tp_withdrawals where user_id = #{user_id} limit #{startPos},#{pageSize}
select sum(money) from tp_withdrawals where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tp_withdrawals (user_id, money, create_time, bank_name, bank_card, realname, remark, taxfee, status, pay_code, error_code, is_paid, query_time, order_sn, serial_number, send_type) values (#{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{create_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bank_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bank_card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxfee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{pay_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{error_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_paid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{query_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serial_number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{send_type,jdbcType=BIT})
